text_ruling:
Looking at the top 3 cards of R&D does not remove the cards
from R&D. The cards are still in R&D and able to be affected by
operations played with Accelerated Diagnostics. [Official FAQ]

Each operation the Corp looks at can be played in any order. The
Corp does not have to play the topmost operation first. [Official FAQ]

When the Corp plays an operation, they fully resolve it before
playing another one or trashing the rest of the cards. [Official FAQ]

If any of the 3 cards looked at are no longer in the top 3 positions
of R&D (as determined when Accelerated Diagnostics was played),
then those cards cannot be played. [Official FAQ]

The Corp can only play and look at the top 3 cards (as determined
when Accelerated Diagnostic was played). Even if other cards are
moved into the top 3, those cards are not eligible to be played/
looked at by the Accelerated Diagnostics. [Official FAQ]

If one of the operations played shuffles R&D, the remainder of
Accelerated Diagnosticsâ€™ effect is ignored. [Official FAQ]
